unnormalised: **Social Media & Influencer Marketing: Brand Collabs are the New Saree at an Indian Wedding!**
normalised: **Social Media and Influencer Marketing: Brand Collaborations are the New Saree at an Indian Wedding!**

unnormalised: Okay, folks, lemme tell you, brand collaborations are absolutely blowing up! It's like everyone and their ajji are teaming up. Forget subtle product placements; we're talking full-blown collabs plastered all over Instagram.
normalised: Okay, folks, let me tell you, brand collaborations are absolutely blowing up! It is like everyone and their ajji are teaming up. Forget subtle product placements; we are talking full-blown collaborations plastered all over Instagram.

unnormalised: Remember that amazing campaign for Onam where Priya Varrier partnered with Kerala Tourism AND Amul butter? Genius! Think delicious biryani photos sponsored by Swiggy and a local restaurant in Hyderabad.
normalised: Remember that amazing campaign for Onam where Priya Varrier partnered with Kerala Tourism and Amul butter? Genius! Think delicious biryani photos sponsored by Swiggy and a local restaurant in Hyderabad.

unnormalised: But here’s the chai tea: are they working? Some collabs feel forced, like pairing Dosa with Maggi (shudders!). Others, like Virat Kohli promoting Audi? Natural fit.
normalised: But here is the chai tea: are they working? Some collaborations feel forced, like pairing Dosa with Maggi (shudders!). Others, like Virat Kohli promoting Audi? Natural fit.

unnormalised: Influencer Rohini Iyer just dropped a collab with a sustainable fashion brand, promoting handloom sarees made by artisans in Rajasthan. Talk about a win-win!
normalised: Influencer Rohini Iyer just dropped a collaboration with a sustainable fashion brand, promoting handloom sarees made by artisans in Rajasthan. Talk about a win-win!

unnormalised: Expect to see even more wacky and wonderful partnerships this Diwali season. Will it be firecrackers with Cadbury? Or maybe diyas with a detergent brand? Only time will tell! But one thing’s for sure: Your Insta feed will be flooded. Get ready to scroll! Maybe you'll even start your own collab, eh? Just thinking out loud!
normalised: Expect to see even more wacky and wonderful partnerships this Diwali season. Will it be firecrackers with Cadbury? Or maybe diyas with a detergent brand? Only time will tell! But one thing is for sure: Your Insta feed will be flooded. Get ready to scroll! Maybe you will even start your own collaboration, eh? Just thinking out loud!
